1143410.name: Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition Tyrants of the Moonsea Official Soundtrack
1143410.description: Experience the inspiring original soundtrack for Tyrants of the Moonsea composed by Mark Braga, Kalen Smith, and Will Musser. All twenty-five tracks are provided in both MP3 (320 kbit) and lossless FLAC format, for your listening pleasure. Total Length: 34 min, 48 sec.
1143410.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
